snippet.title: HYPER ARENA VR - full body tracking feature
snippet.description:
Hyper Arena VR – it’s an exciting game made for VR (HTC VIVE) to provide excellent competition between two (and more) players. There’s also spectator who can explore and comment all battles

and show it to wide audiance. Just imagine full stadium of people (online stream) who are watching gladiators rumble on virtual arena,

when not only reflex and concentration matters… But also physical muscle strength, agility, balance and creativity to finish opponent with style.

Hyper Arena is a perfect balance between Sport and E-Sport!
